items.sentence: Tom didn\'t get up this morning as early as he usually does.
I\'m pretty sure Tom doesn\'t enjoy watching baseball on TV.
How were you able to stay so calm in such a scary situation?
Tom sat alone at the table with a half-empty bottle of wine.
Everybody was afraid that something bad was going to happen.
Barcodes have made getting through the checkout much faster.
We\'ll have known each other for three years next Christmas.
Tom made it quite clear who we weren\'t supposed to talk to.
This food is delicious. Where did you learn to cook so well?
Tom bargained with the salesman hoping to get a lower price.
